mapper.select: select b.buyer_id memberId, b.category_id categoryId, b.brand_id brandId from business_relationship b where b.buyer_id =#{memberId} and b.seller_id=#{sellerId} and b.delete_flag = 0 and b.audit_status ='1' and (b.category_id !=0 and b.brand_id !=0)
select b.seller_id sellerId from business_relationship b where b.buyer_id =#{memberId} and b.delete_flag = 0 and b.audit_status ='1' and (b.category_id !=0 and b.brand_id !=0)

select b.seller_id sellerId, b.buyer_id memberId, b.customer_manager_id customerManagerId from business_relationship b where b.delete_flag = 0 and b.audit_status ='1' and b.buyer_id =#{memberId} and b.seller_id=#{sellerId} and b.category_id = #{categoryId} and b.brand_id = #{brandId} and (b.category_id !=0 and b.brand_id !=0)
SELECT box_id boxId, buyer_id buyerId, seller_id sellerId, erp_status erpStatus, delete_flag deleteFlag FROM box_relationship where delete_flag=0 and buyer_id=#{memberId}
SELECT box_id boxId, buyer_id buyerId, seller_id sellerId FROM box_relationship where delete_flag = 0 and seller_id = #{_parameter}

select a.id memberId, a.member_code memberCode, m.company_name companyName from member_company_info m LEFT JOIN member_base_info a on m.member_id = a.id where m.buyer_seller_type = '2' and a.seller_type='1' and a.status='1' and m.member_id in (select b.seller_id from member_base_info a left join box_relationship b on a.id = b.buyer_id and b.delete_flag = '0' where a.status='1' and a.member_code = #{memberCode})
